title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. IV, pt. 276 - RULES OF PRACTICE
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. IV, pt. 276 - RULES OF PRACTICE
State Regulations
§ 276.1 - Stay of proceedings
§ 276.2 - Oral argument
§ 276.3 - Extensions of time to answer or reply
§ 276.4 - Memoranda of law
§ 276.5 - Additional affidavits, exhibits and other supporting papers
§ 276.6 - Records and reports
§ 276.7 - Decisions to be filed
§ 276.8 - Reopening of a prior decision
§ 276.9 - Dismissal of appeal
§ 276.10 - Transfer of appeals and severance of claims
§ 276.11 - Procedures in a charter school location/co-location appeals pursuant to Education Law Section 2853(3)
§ 276.12 to 276.14 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. IV, pt. 276

Statutory authority: Education Law, §§ 101, 207, 215, 305[1], [2], 310, 311, 2853[3][a-5], 3202[1], [8], 3209[7], 3214, 3712, 3713[1], [2], 4403, 4404, 4410; L. 2010, ch. 101, § 15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
